article_title: Looking for lung cancer: Can low-dose screening pass the test?
article_text:
Mary Stutzman/MEDILL

Deadliest cancer: Every year, lung cancer kills more people than the top three leading cancers.

Looking for lung cancer: Can low-dose screening pass the test?



Photos courtesy of Donna Gaidamak Six years ago, Donna Gaidamak was diagnosed with stage 4 lung cancer, but that hasn't stopped her from living a full life.
article_summary:
